fields.name: characters
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic characters with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: characters_filtered_by_a_comic_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of characters which appear in a specific comic with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: characters_filtered_by_a_series_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of characters which appear in specific series, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: characters_filtered_by_a_story_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic characters appearing in a single story, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: characters_filtered_by_an_event_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of characters which appear in a specific event, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: comics
fields.description: Fetches lists of comics with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: comics_filtered_by_a_character_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comics containing a specific character, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: comics_filtered_by_a_creator_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comics in which the work of a specific creator appears, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: comics_filtered_by_a_series_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comics which are published as part of a specific series, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: comics_filtered_by_a_story_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comics in which a specific story appears, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: comics_filtered_by_an_event_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comics which take place during a specific event, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: creators
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic creators with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: creators_filtered_by_a_comic_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic creators whose work appears in a specific comic, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: creators_filtered_by_a_series_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic creators whose work appears in a specific series, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: creators_filtered_by_a_story_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic creators whose work appears in a specific story, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: creators_filtered_by_an_event_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic creators whose work appears in a specific event, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: events
fields.description: Fetches lists of events with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: events_filtered_by_a_character_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of events in which a specific character appears, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: events_filtered_by_a_comic_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of events in which a specific comic appears, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: events_filtered_by_a_creator_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of events featuring the work of a specific creator with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: events_filtered_by_a_series_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of events which occur in a specific series, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: events_filtered_by_a_story_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of events in which a specific story appears, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: series
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic series with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: series_filtered_by_a_character_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic series in which a specific character appears, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: series_filtered_by_a_creator_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic series in which a specific creator's work appears, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: series_filtered_by_a_story_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic series in which the specified story takes place. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: series_filtered_by_an_event_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic series in which a specific event takes place, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: single_character_by_id
fields.description: This method fetches a single character resource.  It is the canonical URI for any character resource provided by the API.

fields.name: single_comic_by_id
fields.description: This method fetches a single comic resource.  It is the canonical URI for any comic resource provided by the API.

fields.name: single_comic_series_by_id
fields.description: This method fetches a single comic series resource.  It is the canonical URI for any comic series resource provided by the API.

fields.name: single_comic_story_by_id
fields.description: This method fetches a single comic story resource.  It is the canonical URI for any comic story resource provided by the API.

fields.name: single_creator_by_id
fields.description: This method fetches a single creator resource.  It is the canonical URI for any creator resource provided by the API.

fields.name: single_event_by_id
fields.description: This method fetches a single event resource.  It is the canonical URI for any event resource provided by the API.

fields.name: stories
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic stories with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: stories_filtered_by_a_character_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic stories  featuring a specific character with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: stories_filtered_by_a_comic_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic stories in a specific comic issue, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: stories_filtered_by_a_creator_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic stories by a specific creator with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: stories_filtered_by_a_series_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic stories from a specific series with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

fields.name: stories_filtered_by_an_event_id
fields.description: Fetches lists of comic stories from a specific event, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: ComicDataWrapper_data
types.description: The results returned by the call.

fields.name: count
fields.description: The total number of results returned by this call.

fields.name: limit
fields.description: The requested result limit.

fields.name: offset
fields.description: The requested offset (number of skipped results) of the call.

fields.name: results
fields.description: The list of comics returned by the call

fields.name: total
fields.description: The total number of resources available given the current filter set.

fields.name: characters
fields.description: A resource list containing the characters which appear in this comic.

fields.name: collectedIssues
fields.description: A list of issues collected in this comic (will generally be empty for periodical formats such as "comic" or "magazine").

fields.name: collections
fields.description: A list of collections which include this comic (will generally be empty if the comic's format is a collection).

fields.name: creators
fields.description: A resource list containing the creators associated with this comic.

fields.name: dates
fields.description: A list of key dates for this comic.

fields.name: description
fields.description: The preferred description of the comic.

fields.name: diamondCode
fields.description: The Diamond code for the comic.

fields.name: digitalId
fields.description: The ID of the digital comic representation of this comic. Will be 0 if the comic is not available digitally.

fields.name: ean
fields.description: The EAN barcode for the comic.

fields.name: events
fields.description: A resource list containing the events in which this comic appears.

fields.name: format
fields.description: The publication format of the comic e.g. comic, hardcover, trade paperback.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID of the comic resource.

fields.name: images
fields.description: A list of promotional images associated with this comic.

fields.name: isbn
fields.description: The ISBN for the comic (generally only populated for collection formats).

fields.name: issn
fields.description: The ISSN barcode for the comic.

fields.name: issueNumber
fields.description: The number of the issue in the series (will generally be 0 for collection formats).

fields.name: modified
fields.description: The date the resource was most recently modified.

fields.name: pageCount
fields.description: The number of story pages in the comic.

fields.name: prices
fields.description: A list of prices for this comic.

fields.name: resourceURI
fields.description: The canonical URL identifier for this resource.

fields.name: series
fields.description: A summary representation of the series to which this comic belongs.

fields.name: stories
fields.description: A resource list containing the stories which appear in this comic.

fields.name: textObjects
fields.description: A set of descriptive text blurbs for the comic.

fields.name: thumbnail
fields.description: The representative image for this comic.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The canonical title of the comic.

fields.name: upc
fields.description: The UPC barcode number for the comic (generally only populated for periodical formats).

fields.name: urls
fields.description: A set of public web site URLs for the resource.

fields.name: variantDescription
fields.description: If the issue is a variant (e.g. an alternate cover, second printing, or directors cut), a text description of the variant.

fields.name: variants
fields.description: A list of variant issues for this comic (includes the "original" issue if the current issue is a variant).

types.name: Float
types.description: The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by [IEEE 754](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name, description and optional `specifiedByUrl`, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields`, `interfaces`, and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: VARIABLE_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a variable definition.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an argument definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a union definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object type definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field definition.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted using the Markdown syntax, as specified by [CommonMark](https://commonmark.org/).

directives.name: specifiedBy
directives.description: Exposes a URL that specifies the behaviour of this scalar.

args.name: url
args.description: The URL that specifies the behaviour of this scalar.
